title: Movie poster - Sherlock Holmes : A Game of shadows
content:
Hi everybody,

Does anyone know the name of the different typefaces used on this "Sherlock Holmes" movie poster ?

Thank you for all the help you can provide !

Tristan

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/holmes%20nd%20watson2_4208.jpg)

Font: 

 Clarendon 

Solved By: 

 [donshottype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140228/http:/typophile.com/user/205259 "View user profile.")
author: Tristan Isaac

comments.content:
The main title, date, and names at the top all appear to be Clarendon:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/clarendon/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140228/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/clarendon/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/clarendon/")

Rest of the type is too small to accurately ID.
Thank you very much. These are just the ones I was looking for.
